Design_Element: What is the conceptual definition of an antenna array?

Question_Text: The slot and patch resonances can be tuned to operate at two separate frequencies.[12]

Question_Text: The patch must be large enough to provide sufficient coupling area with the feed line.[13]

Question_Text: The maximum input resistance (highest resistance).[10]

Question_Text: conceptually?
Answer_Text: It acts as a short circuit at the even harmonics

Question_Text: The short circuited stubs connected to a common ground plane.[18]
